comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content: Martin B-26C-20-MO Marauder N5546N ex 41-35071, modified to AT-23B, later redesignated TB-26C.  Various civil owners and regs, ended up with Confederate Air Force as the one-of-a-kind flyable B-26 warbird 'Carolyn' but tragically crashed in 1995 killing all 5 aboard.
